summary: let's start a war (at the gay bar)
title: let's start a war (at the gay bar)
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2HFTJqr

by yesterdaychild

Bucky just wants to do something stupid tonight. He’s aching for something dumb - preferably something big and dumb - and he just really wants to kiss someone. So he heads out to the hottest gay bar in town, where he meets the latest newcomer to New York.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Clarity
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2K9IVCj

by muchmoremajestic

Tony was pretty sure he had experienced the entire range of human emotion over the past few days…

The bottomless relief that Steve was actually okay. And the hurt that Steve went behind the Avengers’ backs to help T’Challa that put him in direct harm in the first place.

That last one actually made Tony feel guilty; he wasn’t surprised that Steve had gone to help T’Challa - frankly, it would be uncharacteristic of Steve to not go help - but Steve’s good intentions didn’t erase the weeks of anger and depression and pain Tony and the others had felt once they thought Steve was gone…

What do you say to someone when you thought they were dead and now they’re not?

Words: 1230, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Avengers Assemble (Cartoon)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Hulk (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Sam Wilson (Marvel), Kamala Khan, Carol Danvers
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Minor or Background Relationship(s)
  • Additional Tags: Getting Together, Reunions, Past Character Death, Angst with a Happy Ending, Tony POV, Minor Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2K9IVCj

blog.name: mrscutiefandobhaz
blog.title: - ̗̀lover ̖́-
blog.description: Let/Leth ● writer wannabe ● tagging lists

body:
One lifetime pt. 1 | sneak peek

“Hey, kiddo, everything good?” he said, trying to sound cheerful, as if nothing was wrong, holding her wrist with one hand and get out the strands of hair that were on her cheek with his other hand.

She opened her eyes, seeing him close to her, shaking a little bit because she was cold, “Yeah, I just need to rest for a bit,” she tried to smile at him, which he reciprocated, comforting her, rubbing his hands on her arm to get some warmth to her.

“Don’t leave me just yet, okay?” he tried to joke, smiling down at her, she chuckled softly, took his hand in hers for a few seconds before she let go, closing her eyes again slowly.

MCU’S tagging list

@riseandshinelittleblossom @golddaggers @brien-odylan @lettersofwrittencollective @sailingintothenight

tags: no i still haven't forgiven whedon can u tell?
they were there like twice in the background
and then clint still shares a scene with wanda to talk about nat
summary: i love how the russos really gave us as much clintasha content as they could. like natasha really spends 5 years keeping track...
body:
i love how the russos really gave us as much clintasha content as they could.

like natasha really spends 5 years keeping track of clint and crying in silence about what he’s become.

natasha’s the one who brings him back from the brink of insanity. like he’s right there in the middle of killing people and then he just stands there and takes her hand and allows her to guide him back home.

natasha’s back to wearing her arrow necklace again.

they share some really intense and intimate scenes where they are both legit willing to die for the other (never mind that that scene™ is literally about sacrificing that which you love most in order to obtain the soul stone).

i’m pretty sure they would’ve reversed that unholy age-of-ultron-atrocity if they’d been given the green light, but they couldn’t, so instead they decided to give us some of the best clintasha scenes anyway and basically said farm family who?

blog.name: queenofthepimps
blog.title: Home Of Art And Anything Humorous
blog.description: That is, all the things I find anyway. And maybe some extra stuff while I'm at it. Good vibes people. I Still have no idea what I'm doing...

summary: There’s this female version of Spider-man called Ultimate Spider Woman/ Jessica Drew. I think I look a lot like her and I’ve...
body:
Alright folks, I need help

There’s this female version of Spider-man called Ultimate Spider Woman/ Jessica Drew. I think I look a lot like her and I’ve always loved Spider-man and have wanted to play a Spider person forever.

So I really just wanted to get Marvel’s attention somehow.

I know this seems like a dumb request, but I could really use the help.

reblog.comment:

Alright folks, I need help

There’s this female version of Spider-man called Ultimate Spider Woman/ Jessica Drew. I think I look a lot like her and I’ve always loved Spider-man and have wanted to play a Spider person forever.

So I really just wanted to get Marvel’s attention somehow.

I know this seems like a dumb request, but I could really use the help.

blog.name: companionjones
blog.title: Requests Are Open!
blog.description: No Smut Please!

title: Late Start, Great Discussion
body:
Requested by: Anon

Request: im having a bad day and i was wondering if you could write something about coulson helping? im not feeling good in my body (i gained a lot of weight bc of my antidepressants). hope this isnt too annoying

Fandoms: Marvel, MCU, Agents of SHIELD

Pairing: Coulson x Reader

Warnings: Mentions of depression

Author’s Note: This takes places around the first season of Agents of SHIELD.

*******

    Everyday, it was getting harder and harder for you to get out of bed. You had been laying there for twenty minutes when Coulson found you in your bunk.

    He gently informed you, “Hey, Y/n. Today’s briefing was ten minutes ago.”

    Coulson’s voice brought you back from wherever you were. “Coulson!” you shouted, shooting up out of bed to stand for your superior. “I’m so sorry. This will never happen again. I know it’s completely unprofessional to–”

    The agent put his hands up in surrender. “Whoa, whoa! Calm down, okay? Why don’t you take a seat?”

    Biting your lip in embarrassment, you followed orders.

    Phil moved to sit down next to you. “May I?”

    You nodded.

    He took a seat. “I’ve noticed something about you lately, Y/n. Is everything okay?”

    “Yes, sir. I am so sorry that it affected my work. I–” You were rambling hard, and completely avoiding Coulson’s eyes.

    Your boss interrupted you, again. “It’s not affecting your work. Y/n, you’re one of SHIELD’s best agents. This hasn’t changed any of that. I just…would like to know what ‘this’ is, if that’s okay.”

    “Coulson, y…you don’t want to know about my problems. They’re nothing compared to all this stuff we have going on–”

    Once more, he interrupted you. “It’s something to me.”

    There was a pause, and you searched Coulson’s eyes for anything but sincerity. You couldn’t find anything else. With that, everything came pouring out.

    It started with your depression. You didn’t know where it originated from, but you knew you had had it your whole life. It was your team at SHIELD that had talked you into getting help. It was the help that got you the antidepressants, The drugs helped for a while, but you could always count on yourself to find the downside in everything. You had noticed you had gained weight, and a lot of your old feelings were back. They weren’t as bad as they had been before, but they were there.

    Honestly, you were surprised Coulson didn’t interrupt you again to tell you that he had changed his mind about hearing you rant. Instead, he patiently sat, clearly listening intently to every word you said.

    Phil Coulson was quiet after you were done talking. You were, too. You were out things to say, anyway.

    Finally, after some time thinking, Coulson admitted, “I’m glad you’re still taking the pills.”

    The admission took you off guard. You vaguely remembered telling him that through all the bad stuff that was going on in your head, you continued to take your antidepressants.

    He continued, “Even though they might sound crazy, it’s important to listen to the professionals with this kind of stuff. If they tell you to take the antidepressants, then you should take the antidepressants…And as for the weight gain, you…are gorgeous. You’ve always been gorgeous, and you will continue to be gorgeous. You’re amazing, Y/n. I am so proud of you.”

    You started crying earlier than you would’ve liked to. Actually, you would’ve preferred not to have cried at all. Forgetting that, you hugged Coulson close. “Thank you, boss. You don’t know what your words mean to me.”

    Coulson chuckled, “I hope they mean something good.”

    “They do, Coulson,” you assured, “They do.”

*******

Author’s Note: Thank you for reading! Fill up that heart and reblog if you liked it! If you would like to read more, I have more fics on the MCU over on my page. You should go check it out. Also, REQUESTS ARE OPEN. I take requests for one-shots, multi-chapters, headcannons, and preferences. No smut, please. I write for a variety of fandoms. If you’re wondering if I write for a specific fandom, please ask me. Have a nice day, night, or whatever time it is for you.<3

blog.name: cats-and-fiction
blog.title: Just imagine...
blog.description: Requests: Open ||| Matchups: Closed ||| SFW/NSFW ||| Info ||| Masterlist

summary: I don’t know if you are writing for mcu now or not - so if not: ignore this. Some hcs about Cap x female so who cannot control...
question: I don’t know if you are writing for mcu now or not - so if not: ignore this. Some hcs about Cap x female so who cannot control her powers yet?
answer:
I think I can do start writing for Marvel, tho I believe it won‘t be as good as others :> Hope you still like it


  • It was a normal day while training that it happend. Steve had slowly pushed you into the training room and had tried to convince you to train to control your abilities.
  • It happend a few times before that you hadn‘t yourself under control and almost hurt him but last week it wasn‘t almost. It really happend. You had hurt your love and were devestated and swore to yourself to never use your abilities again.
  • Steve had always told you that it wasn‘t your fault that it happend. You were still learning and he could take that. He didn‘t mind the bruises and the broken rib since he was used worse
  • Over the week his bruises had healed up pretty quickly and everyday had tried to convince you to train again
  • Now it was the day that he had just took you with him. Before you had the chance to exit the room again he lightly grabbed ypur shoulder and stepped in front of you, between you and the door
  • „Y/n, please. I just want the best for you and I know you can do that.“, he took your chin in his hand and made you look up to him. His eyes were full of love and admiriation while he smiled.
  • You slowly felt tears in your eyes while looking at him. How did you deserve such a loving man like him?
  • „But I don‘t want to hurt you again. What if something more bad happens?“, your voice cracked and his smile just got warmer.
  • „I trust you and know that it won‘t happen“
  • - It he was right. Sometimes your abilities got out of control for a second while training but you never hit him. Not like the times before that you hit him almost. The trust and love he had in you helped you.
